UNPLAYABLE.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable cards cannot be played from your hand.

FIRE.DESCRIPTION: Only Ammo can be fired. Firing Ammo activates its effect and discards it.

INNATE.DESCRIPTION: Start each combat with this card in your hand.

VULNERABLE.DESCRIPTION: Vulnerable creatures take #b50% more damage from Attacks.

FRAIL.DESCRIPTION: While Frail, gain #b25% less #yBlock from cards.

CURSE.DESCRIPTION: Curse cards are negative cards that stay in your deck.

TRANSFORM.DESCRIPTION: Transformed cards become a random card of any rarity.

WEAK.DESCRIPTION: Weakened creatures deal #b25% less damage with Attacks.

STATUS.DESCRIPTION: Status cards are removed at the end of combat.

STRENGTH.DESCRIPTION: Strength adds additional damage to attacks.

TODO.DESCRIPTION: This card is NOT IMPLEMENTED. Someone should really fix that...

DEXTERITY.DESCRIPTION: Dexterity improves Block gained from cards.

LOCKED.DESCRIPTION: This card has yet to be unlocked.

ETHEREAL.DESCRIPTION: If this card is in your hand at the end of turn, it is exhausted. Exhausted cards are removed from your deck until the end of combat.

UPGRADE.DESCRIPTION: Upgrading cards makes them more powerful. Cards can only be upgraded once.

RETAIN.DESCRIPTION: Retained cards are not discarded at the end of turn.

POISON.DESCRIPTION: Poisoned creatures lose HP at the start of their turn. Each turn, Poison is reduced by #b1.

UNKNOWN.DESCRIPTION: This card has yet to be encountered.

STRIKE.DESCRIPTION: Any card with the word "Strike" in its name.

CONFUSED.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a card, randomize its cost.

TEXT: Energy is used to play cards from your hand.

SHIV.DESCRIPTION: Shivs are #b0 cost Attack cards which Exhaust.
